definition: to cash/to exchange/to add (liquid)/to blend/one of the Eight Trigrams 八卦[ba1 gua4], symbolizing swamp/☱

sentences.english: The tolls, which include a government passage tax, varied from $4 to $30 per vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 隧道收費連政府通過稅，每程由4元至30元不等。

sentences.english: Sitting at his toll booth one day, the publican saw Jesus approaching.
sentences.chinese: 有一天，馬太坐在稅關上，看見耶穌向他走來。

sentences.english: No taxes on IBCs; low tax rate for domestic companies.
sentences.chinese: 沒有稅，國內公司低稅率。

sentences.english: The state government claims they have reduced personal taxation.
sentences.chinese: 州政府聲稱已經減收了個人稅。

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我們請了一位稅務諮詢師，以便我們少交點稅。

sentences.english: Any cigarettes in 1925 Guichi County Tax Bureau.
Gives high earners big breaks on the payroll tax.
sentences.chinese: 給予高收入者較大幅度的收入稅減免。

sentences.english: Other federal taxes include the corporate profit tax and social insurance (Social Security) taxes.
sentences.chinese: 聯邦政府的其他稅收還有公司利潤稅和社會保險稅。

sentences.english: This year, China introduced an environment tax all of a sudden.
sentences.chinese: 而今年，中國突然引入環境稅。

sentences.english: Others include luxury tax, inheritance tax, and corporate income tax.
sentences.chinese: 其他包括奢侈稅，繼承稅和企業所得稅。

sentences.english: Our company employed a tax consultant so that we can pay less tax.
sentences.chinese: 我們請了一位稅務諮詢師，以便我們少交點稅。

sentences.english: It is suggested that insurance payments be rated up for the adventurists.
sentences.chinese: 有人建議向冒險者收更高的保險稅。

sentences.english: If you open a trading company in the Free Zone, you can enjoy the exemption of import-export duties.
sentences.chinese: 在免稅區開辦貿易公司，還可以享受進出口稅全免。

sentences.english: It earns fat revenues from alcohol taxes and hotel casinos.
sentences.chinese: 酒精稅，旅館賭場，給當局帶來了鉅額收益。

sentences.english: The central government will begin collecting fees for waste disposal.
sentences.chinese: 中央政府計劃徵收垃圾處置稅。

sentences.english: Buffett said he paid $15, 300 in payroll taxes.
sentences.chinese: 巴菲特表示他的總收入裏15300美元爲工資稅。

definition: to hand in/to hand over/to seize
expenditures/expenses/CL:筆|笔[bi3], 項|项[xiang4]/to spend money/(coll.) to pay wages
